> macaca ecosystem

## Installment

```bash
$ npm i macaca-ecosystem --save-dev
```

## Usage

```bash
$ `npm bin`/macaca-ecosystem push -c ./docs_dist --branch gh-pages
```

current branch name should be [master|develop] or starts with `docs`, e.g. like `docs/update-usage`.
